item.title: [video] – Developing Android REST Client Applications
item.description: Virgil Dobjanschi demonstrates in this Google I/O session patterns for developing RESTful applications on the Android platform. [youtube xHXn3Kg2IQE] (via Google I/O 2010) Related articles
